metadata.name: MERAH
metadata.description:
Merah is ego, shame, power, dominance, stagnation, hollow, confidence, ignorance, lust, selfishness, resentment, ignominy. 

In order to explore other colors and their paths, Merah must open the journey and stay here. Within these walls, within this box. It will bounce back and forth, satisfied with its own force. Not being the drive and motivation for other colors, it will remain here. 

“..the human being to lack that second skin we call egoism has not yet been born, it lasts much longer than the other one, that bleeds so readily.” — José Saramago, Blindness

5% of the purchase will be donated to Palang Merah Indonesia (Red Cross Indonesia).

production Equinox of Motion
Director Daniel Doroshenko
DOP Nathanael Moss
Producer Clarice Frederick
Music d quarter
Stylist Yasmin Imanina
Makeup Artist Njiecw
Editing SP
Performer Daniel Doroshenko

Dimensions: 1320x1080
Audio: Stereo 16bits 48khz
Duration: 00:34


#EquinoxofMotion #CHROMOSTHESIA #DanceNFT #PerformanceNFT
